com.foreach.across.modules.hibernate.repositories

Class BasicRepositoryImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.hibernate.repositories.BasicRepositoryImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasicRepository<T>
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class BasicRepositoryImpl<T>
extends Object
implements BasicRepository<T>

    Basic implementation for a imple Hibernate based repository. Deprecated, favour the use of Spring Data JPA repositories instead.
